name: getgamelist
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool evosis_s_game_database.
Tool description: You can access technical and store information of more than 9100+ games. 
Playstation (PS1:130,PS2:359,PS3:666,PS4:2399,PS5:527)
PC (windows:6310, MacOS:2161, Linux:1370)
Xbox (Original:252,Xbox360:681,XOne:2080,XSeries521)
Nintendo Games (GameCube:130,Wii:161,WiiU:107,Switch:1908)
API description: Fetches a list of games from the EvoSiss Game Database API, returning their IDs and series names in JSON format.

page.description: The page number to retrieve from the game list.
